PARAGRAPH.STRING: is a fourteener in the U.S. state of Colorado, located approximately 1 mile (1.6 km) west of Mount Lincoln, in the Mosquito Range.
lies in northwestern Park County, about 2 miles southeast of the town of Climax.
is often climbed together with Mount Lincoln and nearby Mount Bross.
For more information on this group of peaks, including access issues, see Mount Lincoln.
